name: Machine Weft Hair
value: A weft refers to loose hair that has been sewn and 'wefted' together to create extensions. A sewing machine is used to secure the hair at the root, as it is sewn together it creates a 'weft' which is essentially a long line/piece of hair extensions.

name: Raw & Bulk Hair
value: 100% natural hair from Vietnamese and Cambodian women with full cuticle, no silicon, no chemical treatment, no dyeing, no bleaching. Hair strands are selected carefully and tied together with rubber bands, they are raw material for hair extensions

name: Closure & Frontal
value: Want to buy natural closure and Frontal hair?Michair provides natural closures. Available in a variety of sizes, textures. They are virgin hair with closure. Shop now!...

name: Cambodian Hair
value: Cambodian hair is collected directly from Cambodia with 2 textures, namely coarse and natural wavy. This hair if perfect for African women according to the features thick and coarse. It is ethically collected from human donors and you do not need to worry
